body:
I posted the same problem on [Grasshopper forum](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/recursive-with-python).



I am also asking here because I expect someone did the same this using Ladybug&Honeybee.



I am trying to the same thing as [Andrei](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/grasshopper-loop-from-geco-to-custom-script-component).



I would like to make recursion using Python and Honeybee.

But When I connect the output(feedback) of Honeybee to the input of Python,

as you know, it says "1. Recursive data stream found, this component depends on itself".



Any idea to solve this problem ?



Thank you.
